name: @alanscodelog/semantic-release-config

scripts.lint:commits: npx commitlint --from $(git rev-list HEAD --not --remotes | tail -1)^ --to HEAD --verbose

author: Alan <alanscodelog@gmail.com>

devDependencies.@alanscodelog/semantic-release-config: Depends on itself only because the commitlint config package needs it as a peer dependency to get the types. Commitlint might fail if the types change from one version to the other, but then we can just skip the commit hooks.

scripts.lint:commits: Lints all unpushed commits in the active branch.
